content.description:
I found The Satellite Dish on the PDF here, drtopo.com/submitted/mcafeeâ€¦

  I think this is one of the most unique rock formations I have ever seen, it really looks just like a satellite dish! There are tons of jugs and pockets you can climb on, but I wouldn't really rate anything above a VB. You can also easily climb up the front of the dish and get a nice view. It's worth stopping by just to see this rock if you're near Devil's Kitchen.
